Paul Parker Photo
Community Service Society of New York
Collector
Social Worker Back from Visiting
May 18, 1937 1937 Date from related image no. 0853 photographs reformatted digital preservation
still image Description: (There is another 8 X 10 picture taken from the other side of the door, showing the shadow of the social worker) (See Duplicate/Extra Print File) #6992 Stamped "Paul Parker Photo" Similar to picture in COS Annual Report, 1934-1935 (same person, somewhat different pose), facing page 7. Caption: "BACK FROM VISITING" . . . The social worker of the Institute of Family Service does not do her work entirely across the interview table. She visits the home, talks with former employers, consults with doctor or hospital, gets, firsthand, the facts and conditions which must be taken Into account in helping to solve her client's problems. Item no. 0685 Photograph no. 6992 Related to image no. 0853 in this digital collection,
